description:
Manage your personal media library, organize your collection, and stream your content in real time, no waiting required!

A pure JS BitTorrent streaming environment, with a built-in list manager.
Imagine qBit + Taiga + MPV, all in a single package, but streamed real-time.
Completely ad free with no tracking/data collection.
Unlike qBit's sequential approach, seeking into data that hasn't been downloaded yet will prioritise downloading that data, instead of simply closing MPV.
- feat: desktop support for DTS, MLP, and TrueHD audio
  - Linux, Windows, and macOS can now play videos with DTS, MLP, and TrueHD audio codecs.
- feat: disable UTP toggle
  - Adds the ability to disable UTP for the torrent client. This helps in improving stability when on certain networks.
- feat: highlight watched episodes in seekbar
  - The seekbar now subtly shows which episodes you have already watched by changing the progress bar color.
- fix: zero episodes behavior
  - Fixes episode card interaction and torrent modal prompt for zero-episode series.
- fix: fill missing episode images
  - The banner image will now be used on episode list cards when their image is missing, and other episodes have an image.
- fix: YouTube trailers on desktop
  - Added local HTTP server workaround for YouTube embed Error 153 on desktop as YouTube now requires referrer headers.
- fix: top safe area on Android
  - Fixes dead space at the top of the screen due to including the invisible system status bar in the safe area.
  - Fixes app status bar being hidden by camera notch on some devices.
- fix: immersion on Android
  - The player would occasionally fail to immerse during playback.
- fix: reannounce torrents on network reconnect
  - Prevents torrents from remaining stalled after reconnecting to the network by restarting tracker discovery.
- fix: error when adding non-subtitle file
- chore: better fullscreen support
  - Officially supports full-screen on all desktop platforms, which now properly hides the menu bar.
- chore: bump to electron v39.2.7
- chore: refactor
